message.content:
cs.CR, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SY, cs.SE 

The paper discusses a proactive defense approach to thwart attacks by continuously changing the attack surface of a system. This falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The proposed approach uses deep reinforcement learning, which is a popular technique in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG). The approach also involves making decisions based on a partially-observable Markov decision process, which is a common topic in control systems (cs.SY). Finally, the paper discusses numerical results and performance evaluation, which are common in software engineering (cs.SE).
